entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 10:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
